review: Dr Sudhir id highly dedicated, ******* *** professional in neonatal care and pediatrics.  my wife had twin pregnancy and had to undergo emergency surgery in the midnight ( pre term delivery 28 week ). Before my wife was taken to OT he reached hospital and given mental support to us as it was really panic situation for us. Babies were 800 gm and 1200 gm respectively and He has taken care of them like his own , given mental support to us also explained and asked our consent for all the procedures which were performed on babies. now babies are healthy and they are weighing 3.6 kg and 5.6 kg after 8 months. I recommend dr for neonatology and pediatrics and he is a down to earth man.
********* ********* *** good response from doctor                                                                            explanation of treatment is very well on time response is good
